subsection.name: How to manage my legacy projects with MAVEN?
subsection.p: Before doing this you should well understand what is MAVEN and how MAVEN works. These documents can be found at http://maven.apache.org.
Make sure all the jars your project depends can be found at ibiblio.org or other remote jar repository. If they can not, an addistional jar repository should be built.
Then what you need to do is edit the descriptor files ---- project.xml and project.properties, and sometimes you need to reorganize the files in the project.

subsection.name: How to start a new project?
subsection.p: Use your favorite IDE software to create a new project. Remember to put the source files into the folders where MAVEN suggests.
Create descriptor files----project.xml and project.properties. The easiest way is copying them from another project, and change it.
